name: Picture - Extended
description: Extended criteria for overall excellence of a Picture Show.
author: the-zinny team

criteria.name: Storytelling
criteria.description: Clarity, originality, and impact of the narrative.

criteria.name: Visual Aesthetics
criteria.description: Cinematography, production design, and overall visual style.

criteria.name: Emotional Impact
criteria.description: The ability to evoke strong emotions in viewers.

criteria.name: Cultural Significance or Impact
criteria.description: Influence on society or arts and sciences.

criteria.name: Humanity
criteria.description: Contribution to understanding the human condition or how we exist in the world.

criteria.name: Artistry
criteria.description: Advancement of artistic techniques or practices.

criteria.name: Craftwork
criteria.description: Effective use of existing tools and techniques to convey ideas.

criteria.name: Technical Achievement
criteria.description: Adaptation or use of innovative or exceptional technical methods.
